channel.title: Design on Jack Whiting
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Jack Whiting

item.title: Moving to Figma
item.description: In the last 6 months, I’ve moved to using Figma on a permanent basis. I’d spent a fair bit of time in and out of the beta, and now with the official launch, it feels more stable and ready for full time use than ever. With I first tried Figma up it was a bit rough around the edges, it needed refinement and missed some of the fundamentals I was used to, such as Symbols (Sketch had tainted me).
